Useful TW5 plugins

phiv 9th June 2019 at 7:46am
Resources
  • KaTeX
  • FontAwesome (note, the FontAwesome 4.x plugin is necessary for TiddlyMap; it does not appear they conflict with one another)
  • double-click edit
  • TiddlyMap
  • highlight.js syntax highlighter
  • table helper
  • Details widget (requires .css and .js, grab the three documentation tiddlers for good measure)
